title: Dorm Room Maintenance Request
description: A student reports that the light in their dorm room is not working.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their dorm room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and location.

tasks.description: Create a maintenance work order in the facilities management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a work order detailing the issue ('light out').

tasks.description: Provide the student with the work order number and the standard response time for non-emergency requests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the next steps and timeline.
